description:
Does your Boca Raton case deserve a 90-year-old law firm and 300 years of combined legal experience? At Lesser, Lesser, Landy & Smith, PLLC, our Florida law firm offers this and so much more. We treat every personal injury case as confidential and treat our clients with compassion and respect.

How we help families recover

It is virtually impossible to worry about finances and the future and make a full recovery. Even worse, in some cases, the injured party might not survive. Family members are so stricken by grief that both the thought of covering bills alone and seeking fair compensation feels equally overwhelming. Our team works hard so families can focus on moving forward.

What Lesser, Lesser, Landy & Smith, PLLC, is most known for

We have attracted a lot of positive recognition and earned some awards over the years. While none of these can guarantee that we win every case we take on, we earned these because we win often and win big. These are some of our favorites:

• Top 500 leading plaintiff consumer lawyers - Lawdragon, 2020
• Florida Legal Elite - Florida's Trends, 2020
• Florida Legal Elite - Florida's Trends, Hall of Fame
• Best Lawyers, Best Law Firms - U.S. News, 2020

Why settle for less than the best for your personal injury case? Our initial consultation is free, so you have nothing to lose by allowing our law firm to review your case.
